title: Vase And Stand, 1916
dimensions:
(Vase) H x diam.: 7 x 5 cm (2 3/4 x 1 15/16 in.)
(Stand) H x diam.: 2.1 x 3.2 cm (13/16 x 1 1/4 in.)
description:
b: Same except for mirror image of painted scene; bb: same grey green red enamels
On bottom: underglaze blue aa & bb; four Chinese characters in a square [check ledger vol. 40 for image]; many Chinese characters on body [check ledger vol. 40 for images]

tombstone.epitaph: Vase And Stand, 1916. eggshell porcelain. Gift of J. Lionberger Davis. 1968-1-16-b,bb.
